channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street tree (A. negundo) with dieback, 2nd September
item.description:
Street tree outside 63 Kipling Road. Showing signs of decline. SR CBC
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Brooklyn Road, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
